front.title: The Adaptive Demand-Driven Multicast Routing Protocol for Mobile Ad Hoc Networks (ADMR)

abstract.t: The Adaptive Demand-Driven Multicast Routing protocol (ADMR) has been designed specifically for use in the ad hoc network environment. Multicast routing state in ADMR is dynamically established and maintained only for groups that have at least one receiver and one active sender in the network.
